description: Provides information for all active Amazon EC2 instances and Amazon EC2 instances terminated in the last 30 days, up to a maximum of 2,000. Amazon EC2 instances in any of the following states are considered active: AWAITING_FULFILLMENT, PROVISIONING, BOOTSTRAPPING, RUNNING.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The identifier of the cluster for which to list the instances.

parameters.name: InstanceGroupTypes
parameters.description: The type of instance group for which to list the instances. (string) ---

parameters.name: InstanceStates
parameters.description: A list of instance states that will filter the instances returned with this request. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Instances
nested_items.description: The list of instances for the cluster and given filters.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the instance in Amazon EMR.

nested_items.name: Ec2InstanceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the instance in Amazon EC2.

nested_items.name: PublicDnsName
nested_items.description: The public DNS name of the instance.

nested_items.name: PublicIpAddress
nested_items.description: The public IP address of the instance.

nested_items.name: PrivateDnsName
nested_items.description: The private DNS name of the instance.

nested_items.name: PrivateIpAddress
nested_items.description: The private IP address of the instance.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the instance.

nested_items.name: StateChangeReason
nested_items.description: The details of the status change reason for the instance.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The programmable code for the state change reason.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The status change reason description.

nested_items.name: CreationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time of the instance.

nested_items.name: ReadyDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the instance was ready to perform tasks.

nested_items.name: EndDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the instance was terminated.

nested_items.name: InstanceGroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the instance group to which this instance belongs.

nested_items.name: InstanceFleetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the instance fleet to which an Amazon EC2 instance belongs.

nested_items.name: Market
nested_items.description: The instance purchasing option. Valid values are ON_DEMAND or SPOT.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 instance type, for example m3.xlarge.

nested_items.name: EbsVolumes
nested_items.description: The list of Amazon EBS volumes that are attached to this instance.

nested_items.name: Device
nested_items.description: The device name that is exposed to the instance, such as /dev/sdh.

nested_items.name: VolumeId
nested_items.description: The volume identifier of the EBS volume.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
